title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Ticket and Tour information:  Prices: General admission: $25 Students/Seniors: $20  Please note: the Lower East Side Tenement Museum does not accept the Golden Eagle, Golden Age, Golden Access Passports, or the National Parks Pass. Access to the museum is by concessionare fee (guided tour) only.  NOTE: The Lower East Side Tenement Museum does not sell the National Parks Pass.
